message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you that I think you'll love. I'm offering it to you for $140. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit to $135. Let's see if we can make this work!
I'm getting close, but I think I can go a bit lower. How about $132?
